QuestData.Title: Do My Eyes Deceive Me?
QuestData.Description: <Pip's helm explodes with the sound of a loud girlish scream.>$B$BIT CAN'T BE! I... I was stuck inside one of those beasts for the better part of a month. Yes, literally stuck inside its stomach. If it weren't for my suit and the all-purpose helm I'd have died a fiery death! And look at that, it's had a litter of pups!$B$BY... You gotta stop that thing, $n! We can't let it or its pups make it out of here alive!
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: That will save me from a few years of therapy.
QuestData.RewardText: <Finkle's helm crackles with static.>$B$BPhew... That's one less thing I'll need to worry about if we ever make it out of this place.
